summary: Removes the hoods from dragon priest masks.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE:

The mod should be now completely compatible with any hoods/helmets that are otherwise wearable with circlets. Also corrected the description for Morokei in the plus version and removed the armor rating from the circlets (they are unarmored in that version so it\'s only fitting.)

Description:
The goal of this simple mod is to remove the hoods of dragon priest masks.

There are two esp files: 

HoodlessDragonpriestMasks.esp only removes the hoods.

HoodlessDragonpriestMasksPlus.esp removes the hoods, makes all the masks unarmored, and applies the Morokei enchant fix (although it will only display reduce shout cooldown.)

Beast races have clipping through the face; otherwise there\'s only hair clipping.


Incompatibilities:

Anything else that changes the dragon priest masks.
author: insaneguy99
